Hi,
I use a Windows 11 laptop and have been facing a problem with Isabelle lately - there are some permission issues with the database (error message - [SQLITE_CANTOPEN] Unable to open the database file (unable to open database file)), because of which the prover is inactive. I gave full control to all users to all contents in the folder "Isabelle2024", but in vain. Uninstalling and reinstalling Isabelle didn't work. How do I resolve this issue?
Thank you.
Isabelle also needs access to into a $HOME/.isabelle
although I am surprised that It does get the the write authorization by default
I did that, and the issue still persists.
I still get the same error message with the prover being inactive.

Each time I install Isabelle, the permissions are incorrectly ordered. This leads to the database not being accessible and prover being inactive. There's clearly something wrong with my laptop. Can anyone please tell me how I can fix this?
I think that you should ask on the Isabelle mailing-list
Make sure that you include the full error message
and you fully explain what "the permissions are incorrectly ordered" means
I'm having the same issue, did you ever get this problem resolved and if so how?
